pages.text: $(o)Here are a few useful features to note when performing Alchemy of any kind.
$(item)$(o)Litmus Paper$(0) is specially-treated paper that can be used by the adept to measure the strength of Powers in the Crucible.

$(o)The Body Power inhibits reactions from taking place. If you need an unfortunate combination of Powers for a transmutation, add some Body. $(p)It's also good against a certain $(l:intro/curse)other Power$(/l)
In Making the $(item)Staff of Power$(0), the Order follows that of the Reactions of the Secret Powers under a Golden Sign. $(p)$(4)BLASTING(br)FOAMING$(br)FALLING$(0)$(p)This is the Order.
